strapiPost.title: Raise A Glass For Man's Best Friend
strapiPost.content:
The Best Friends Animal Society is hosting a dog friendly pub-crawl in Downtown Rogers this Saturday, Sept 24, from 3-7p. 

  • Best friends: Tickets for the Pup Crawl are good for one dog and one human and can be purchased online or at the Best Friends Animal Society tent any time during the event. All proceeds will support the state of the art Pet Resource Center set to open in Bentonville in early 2023.
  • A doggone deal: Pup crawlers will receive a stamp from participating bars and can redeem a stamped paws-port for 10% off purchases from participating businesses like Woof & Wander, Dandy Roll, The Urban Tub, Brick Lane Books, Threads 314, Nola's Pantry, The Shire Gastropub and more!

You can purchase tickets HERE.
